summary: This mod removes dog meat from vendors, houses, towns, palaces and forts(Kastav) that may be used by the Imperials or Stormcloacks.
descriptionHtml:
No dog meat 
v. 1.1

=====================================

1. Description

	This simple mod removes dog meat from vendors(and vendor stands), towns, houses you can buy as well as other peoples\' homes, palaces and forts like SPOILERS! Fort Kastav that depending on your civil war progress may be occupied by Stormcloacks or Imperials. SPOILERS END!

=====================================

2. Installation

	2.1 Manual Installation

		a. Download file
		b. Open it and extract the .esp file into steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data
		c. Enable the .esp with your favourite mod management programme or the Skyrim Launcher

	2.2 Nexus Mod Manager(Recommended)

		a. Click the \"DOWNLOAD WITH MANAGER\" button on the mod\'s page or below the file on the downloads sub-page
		b. Activate it in Nexus Mod Manager

======================================

3. Permissions

	You may upload this file on other sites as long as you give me credit
	You may modify the file as long as you credit me as the original author
	You may use this file in your own so long as you give me credit

======================================

6. Credits

	Bethesda for the Creation Kit

======================================

7. Changelog

	1.0 - Initial Release
	1.1 - Removed Trevas Watch record since it\'s just being occupied by bandits
author: Apethnatos

files.name: No dog meat
files.changelogHtml: Removed Trevas Watch record since it\'s just being occupied by bandits
